value.title: StarCraft 2: NEW MAJOR PATCH - Campaign, Multiplayer, Co-op and Editor Changes!
value.excerpt: The StarCraft 2 5.0 patch has been announced. In this video I go over the changes and improvements they are planning to make to the campaign, multiplayer, co-op and editor in SC2.   Blog posts: https://news.blizzard.com/en-us/starcraft2/23482888/starcraft-ii-5-0-ptr-patch-notes https://news.blizzard.com/en-us/starcraft2/23471116/starcraft-ii-4-13-0-ptr-patch-notes

value.excerpt: New maps have been announced for StarCraft 2. These maps will be used in both tournaments as well as on the ladder.
